newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Heineken sees profit growth in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Heineken sees profit growth in 1997.

text.p: Dutch brewer Heineken NV said on Friday it expected profits to grow in 1997 after a slight dip in earnings in 1996.
"A profit growth is expected for 1997. The amount of the profit growth cannot be predicted at the present moment," the company said in a statement.
Earlier on Friday Heineken said net profit fell 1.4 percent to 655 million guilders in 1996 from 664 million in 1995.
